howItWorks.title: Simple Process
howItWorks.subtitle: Your Journey to Global Success

step2.title: Browse & Apply
step2.description: Explore job opportunities and apply to positions that match your skills.

step3.title: Interview
step3.description: Complete video interviews and get matched with the right employers.

step4.title: Get Deployed
step4.description: Complete documentation and start your international career.

about.title: Empowering Filipino Workers
about.subtitle: Globally
about.description: We're on a mission to transform overseas employment by putting workers first, leveraging technology, and building a more transparent recruitment industry.
about.missionDescription: To be the most trusted and worker-centric overseas recruitment agency in the Philippines, connecting skilled Filipino workers with global opportunities while ensuring their rights, welfare, and dignity are protected at every step.
about.visionDescription: To revolutionize the overseas employment industry through technology and ethical practices, making international careers accessible, transparent, and rewarding for every Filipino worker who dreams of working abroad.
about.workerFirstDesc: Every decision we make prioritizes the welfare and success of Filipino workers abroad.
about.integrityDesc: We operate with complete transparency and ethical practices in all our dealings.
about.innovationDesc: We leverage technology to create better experiences for workers and employers.
about.partnershipDesc: We build lasting relationships based on trust, respect, and mutual success.
about.foundedDesc: Legaforce was established with a mission to transform overseas recruitment.
about.poealicenseDesc: Received official license from the Philippine Overseas Employment Administration.
about.digitalPlatformDesc: Launched our AI-powered recruitment platform during the pandemic.
about.workers10kDesc: Deployed our 10,000th worker to employers worldwide.
about.isoCertifiedDesc: Achieved ISO 9001 certification for quality management systems.
about.workers50kDesc: Reached milestone of 50,000+ successfully deployed workers.
about.yearsExperience: 20+ years in international recruitment and labor advocacy.
about.poealead: Former POEA official with expertise in deployment processes.
about.techLead: Tech leader driving innovation in recruitment technology.

services.title: Comprehensive
services.subtitle: Recruitment Solutions
services.description: From talent sourcing to deployment and beyond, we provide end-to-end recruitment services powered by technology.
services.coreServicesTitle: Everything You Need for Successful Recruitment
services.coreServicesSubtitle: Our comprehensive suite covers every aspect of international recruitment.
services.cvBuilderDesc: Generate professional CVs instantly with our advanced AI technology.
services.matchingDesc: Intelligent matching connects right candidates with right opportunities.
services.videoInterviewDesc: Conduct seamless remote interviews with our integrated platform.
services.documentsDesc: We handle all documentation from visa applications to medical clearances.
services.trainingDesc: Comprehensive training programs prepare workers for their new roles.
services.supportDesc: Round-the-clock assistance including emergency support and advocacy.
services.processSubtitle: A streamlined, technology-driven process that ensures quality and speed.
services.ctaSubtitle: Whether you're looking for your next opportunity or seeking top talent, we're here to help.

applicants.subtitle: Discover thousands of job opportunities from top employers worldwide
applicants.description: Browse and apply to jobs that match your skills and aspirations with ease
applicants.heroSubtitle: Access 10,000+ verified job openings worldwide. Get deployed in
applicants.categoriesSubtitle: Find opportunities in your field with verified employers worldwide.
applicants.benefitsSubtitle: We put workers first with comprehensive support and transparent practices.
applicants.zeroFeesDesc: We follow ethical recruitment practices. You'll never pay excessive fees to find work abroad.
applicants.workerProtectionDesc: 24/7 support hotline, anonymous reporting system, and advocacy for your rights.
applicants.aiCVBuilderDesc: Create a professional, internationally-formatted CV in minutes with our smart AI tool.
applicants.fastDeploymentDesc: Our streamlined process gets you deployed in 21-30 days, not the usual 90+ days.
applicants.trackingDesc: Track every step of your application from submission to deployment online.
applicants.rewardsDesc: Earn points for completing milestones and redeem them for priority processing.
applicants.destinationsSubtitle: Connect with verified employers from around the world.
applicants.fiveSteps: 5 Simple Steps to Your Dream Job
applicants.stepsSubtitle: Our streamlined process makes finding work abroad easier than ever.
applicants.createAccountDesc: Sign up for free and complete your profile with personal and professional information.
applicants.buildCVDesc: Use our AI-powered CV builder to create a professional, internationally-formatted resume.
applicants.browseJobsDesc: Explore thousands of verified job openings from employers around the world.
applicants.applyInterviewDesc: Submit applications with one click and complete video interviews from home.
applicants.getDeployedDesc: Complete documentation with our guidance and start your international career.
applicants.nurseQuote: From application to deployment in just 25 days! The AI CV builder helped me stand out.
applicants.engineerQuote: Zero fees and full transparency. Legaforce truly puts workers first.
applicants.hotelManagerQuote: The support team was available 24/7. I always felt supported throughout the process.
applicants.ctaSubtitle: Create your free account today and take the first step towards your dream job abroad. No fees, no hidden costs.

employers.title: For Employers
employers.subtitle: Hire skilled Filipino workers quickly and easily
employers.description: Our platform makes international hiring simple, transparent, and efficient
employers.heroSubtitle: Access a pool of 50,000+ skilled, pre-screened Filipino workers. Streamlined recruitment, faster deployment, and comprehensive support for employers worldwide.
employers.whyFilipinoSubtitle: Over 10 million Filipino workers are employed worldwide, valued for their skills and professionalism.
employers.englishProficiencyDesc: The Philippines ranks among the top English-speaking countries in Asia.
employers.workEthicDesc: Filipino workers are known for dedication, loyalty, and attention to detail.
employers.adaptabilityDesc: Easily integrates into diverse work environments and multicultural teams.
employers.skilledWorkforceDesc: Access to professionals across healthcare, engineering, IT, and more.
employers.servicesSubtitle: From sourcing to deployment, we handle every aspect of international recruitment.
employers.aiMatchingDesc: Our intelligent algorithms match you with candidates that perfectly fit your requirements.
employers.videoInterviewsDesc: Conduct interviews remotely with our integrated video platform and evaluation tools.
employers.docProcessingDesc: We handle all visa paperwork, certifications, and compliance requirements.
employers.dedicatedSupportDesc: Your dedicated account manager ensures smooth recruitment and deployment.
employers.industriesSubtitle: We provide skilled workers across all major industries worldwide.
employers.hiringProcessSubtitle: Start hiring world-class Filipino talent in four simple steps.
employers.shareReqDesc: Tell us about your staffing needs, job requirements, and timeline.
employers.candidateMatchingDesc: Our AI matches you with pre-screened, qualified candidates.
employers.interviewSelectDesc: Conduct interviews and select your ideal candidates.
employers.handleRestDesc: We process documentation and deploy workers to your location.
employers.healthcareQuote: Legaforce delivered 50 qualified nurses in just 3 weeks. Their AI matching saved us months of recruitment time.
employers.techQuote: The quality of candidates and speed of deployment exceeded our expectations. Best recruitment partner we've worked with.
employers.hospitalityQuote: Their 24/7 support and transparent process made scaling our workforce seamless. Highly recommended.
employers.readyToHireSubtitle: Meet your staffing needs with skilled Filipino workers through Legaforce.
